tweets.text: For those concerned about the risk to the chalk aquifer  caused by HS2 tunnelling we need access to see the details the environmental approval application lodged with the @EnvAgency recently. The contact email would be enquiries@environment-agency.gov.uk.

Silverdale Feb 2021, My Home, My garden, Cemetery, 
In my car, All month, not very good is it! @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/7r6OeLiT3l

@EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency @LineyMason @mariaadebowale @JudithBatchelar @InesFDSA @MoretonBack1 @DefraGovUK @COP26 @WRIClimate @AdaptOurWorld Would you ask your female Board members and executive directors for their expertise on the environmental devastation @RedIndustries2 are committing, as we would like to create a better place for the people and wildlife of Newcastle under Lyme @StinkStopthe

@SianieRoo @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA would you please respond and put our minds at rest about what the blue powder is? It could be something innocent & allowed but peace of mind means an awful lot, thank you! @StinkStopthe @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL

tweets.text: @DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe Hydrogen Sulphide from a direct wind in my front garden Silverdale Feb 2021, 400 meters away from the landfill! https://t.co/a3cSCKjybc
What a day! Such a treat to see brook lamprey spawning today in the Torridge @EnvAgencySW. Counted more than 20! https://t.co/tBCcVdvGC1
That's it... Time to hand in my badge and gu... VR controller. https://t.co/sEoPRpz1VO

Our green spaces include our #rivers & #canals. They are special places for us all to enjoy. Today the team deployed as part of #OpClampDown9 with local police, @EnvAgencySW Fishery Enforcement, @AnglingTrust Volunteer Bailiffs & @PoliceDrones to help tackle illegal fishing & ASB https://t.co/bKwYi1BWWg

The operator of Walleys Quarry landfill says its tests show it is 'not possible' that ‚Äòhydrogen sulphide contamination‚Äô is coming from its #Silverdale site. Red Industries say it is 'associated with ground water'.
It follows 1000s of complaints about a bad smell in the area.

Understand the @EnvAgency have received an application from HS2 to approve the environmental permit to allow them to start tunnelling. We are told by the @EnvAgency that this is not be open for consultancy even through there is significant risk to our rivers and water supply.

@Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @StaffordshireCC @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL Can the operator just do what they want?...unbelievable. Are the @EnvAgency still on site? Is this another breach? https://t.co/r9D7E2QSWz

Over six years ago we predicted HS2 would make their application to @EnvAgency to approve tunnelling at the last moment and sure enough they have. Why did they do this? purely to avoid public scrutiny of this highly dubious activity that puts rivers and drinking water at risk.

tweets.text: @EnvAgency There are illegal dumpers driving around everyday dumping stuff, even the councils say it is out of control. These repeat criminals rarely get prosecuted.

This shocking picture is a yard filled with illegally dumped construction and demolition waste. #WasteCrime harms our environment and economy. Make sure you dispose of construction waste legally, or risk being fined up to ¬£50,000 or face jail.

Read more: https://t.co/wMYPlu9tFt https://t.co/jE9enBIM9Z

Can you reassure Newcastle residents what that blue powder is & that it‚Äôs safe to inhale? I have a 3 year old breathing in poison from your landfill already. What the heck is that blue powder?? #gassedinourownhomes 
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 https://t.co/xtWdvFkiqO

@p_chilton @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @StaffordshireCC @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL All the schools s close to that place, what future for our poisoned children @ClaireDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL if the land mountain is allowed to grow, Newcastle under Lyme needs Chernobyl type evacuation & shutting forever üíîüò¢

@cain_karlene @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @StaffordshireCC @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @JamesBevanEA @EmmaHowardBoyd @ClareDinnisEA Why are Environment agency scared of red industries, why aren't public health England involved. When stink comes tonight & I ring 0800 807060 I want to be evacuated to a place I can breathe clean air not toxic fumes, Basford bank closing cos pollution, what about Silverdale Rd?

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe Minor breach, wells disconnected, then they go home for weekend leaving us unable to breathe, so evacuate us to where we can breathe & send them the bill, who allowed stinking landfill to become stinking garbage mountain, how high is it going will we even see NuL from Keele Bank?
@EnvAgency What about legal WASTE CRIME @RedIndustries2 #stopthestink ??
@EnvAgencyMids come on now, you need to do something about the @StinkStopthe in Silverdale, Newcastle-under-Lyme. I live 5 miles away and have smelled it. Also, In Goldenhill.
@HibbsA @AaronBell4NUL @Sotlive @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 That must be 4 miles of stink?

@ClareDinnisEA , @JamesBevanEA, @EnvAgencyMids & @DefraGovUK. I am one of the few local people not wanting @RedIndustries2 to #CapItOff at Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill. All I want is to #StopTheStink, and for that, we need effective regulation from the Environment Agency.

Nature gives to every time and seasons some beautiesüå≥üå≤ of its own, why don't we embrace those beauties and enjoy healthy living?

Plant more trees. Care for humanity.

Helping nature, helps people
Heart with nature ‚ù§Ô∏è https://t.co/puHW3vBpZV

urls.title: Bottle deposit scheme faces delay till 2024 because of Covid pandemic

tweets.text: Our Upper #Medway team has begun a project to inspect locks, sluices, bridges and weirs, ahead of people getting back onto the river this summer. Here's our dive inspector (probably scaring local children) at Town Lock in #Tonbridge https://t.co/zkTVCw5sMV
